duties_responsibilities.duty: Recover all store areas daily to ensure they're clean and well stocked.
Perform stocking, sanitation, and merchandising activities to maintain product freshness and quality.
Provide customer service by answering product-related questions and assisting customers in a friendly manner.
Maintain a clean and safe store environment for the customer shopping experience.
Operate material handling equipment to move and replenish products across multiple departments.
Assist with loading, unloading, and moving heavy, bulky products to support in-stock conditions when needed.
